Then Katniss stuck out her tongue and began licking Prim's feet and Prim started laughing louder than before "nooooooKatnisssstttttooooopppppphahahahahahahahaha" but Katniss ignored her begging and continued to let her tongue explore all over Prim's feet, then she put her tongue inbetween her toes and Prim screamed and soon had tears running down her face. Katniss continued licking her little sisters feet for about 10 more minutes then stopped and Prim was out of breath and her face was red. "Katniss plz no more" Prim began begging, "sorry Prim but i have this whole day to tickle you and its only 3pm. Prim sighed and began crying a little bit thinking of how much more torture she was going to go through, "now what should we do next" Katniss thought.
121112.title: katniss licks them herself

choices: Decides to stop and tickle somewhere else
Let her go and say she can do something to her for tickling her
1211121.content: Katniss goes to get a electric toothbrush, she comes back and prim just recovered from laughing, katniss looks to her sisters soft bare feet and leans down, her feet were in the toes up position since she was on her back. Katniss turn it on and the hum started from it, she put it to prims heel , and prim Immedialty started giggling, katniss moves up to her sole and medium arch, and set the toothbrush to fast, and slowly slid it up and down every inch of prims sole, prim Burst out laughing and screaming, katniss goes to her arch, she strokes the brush up and down her perfect arch and prim giggled and squirmed. Next her toes, katniss decided to go to her toes, but before she did, she saw the "ball" shaped part beneath her big toe, she knew what it was called, " prim, if you get this right, I won't tickle you there, get it wrong, and... What's the part called right here" katniss asked while she stroked it the back of the toothbrush, " easy, the ball" prim said excitedly, " correct" katniss said as she turned on the brush and put it to the ball, "HAHAH you said you weren't!" Prim screamed, "I lied" katniss smirked, then she went to her toes, she brushed underneath them and on the skin below it and prim was laughing immensely. Katniss....
1211121.title: Use an electric toothbrush on her feet

1211122.content: "i'm getting alittle bored here prim" katniss said. "i'm gonna change things up abit" katniss says while getting an electric toothbrush. then katniss slowly pulls up prim's dress exposing prim's pale belly. "please no katniss, not there!" screamed prim. "why prim, i feel like we're really bonding" katniss then turned the electris toothbrush and started brushing her sister's belly. "NOOOOOOOO HAHAHAHAHA! KATNISS HAHAHAHAHA STHAHAOP!" but katniss just ignored her and after 12 minutes of this, katniss began to lick and kiss prim's belly while prim was wiggling and giggling.
1211122.title: Move up to her belly

12111222.content: Katniss then pulled prim's dress off and began stroking her finger along prim's silly smooth armpits. "HAHAHAHA katniss HAHA this has gone long enough." katniss stoped and let her sister talk."katniss, can I tickle you now,it's only fair.
12111222.title: tickle her armpits

121112221.content: Katniss says alright fine and lets prim tie her up with rope and asks where should i tickle you first and with what? Prim lifts up katniss's shirt and goes to get milk to pour on her. After she does she gets her cat buttercup and has her lick katniss's belly clean. Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaahah ahahahahahaha screams Katniss as the cat's tongue tickles katniss's belly. Prim thinks where should I tickle you next?
121112221.title: Katniss let's her

1212.content: "I'll start with her belly" Katniss thought. She slowly pulled up Prim's shirt, exposing her bare stomach. She started by mercilessly tickling Prim's ribs, causing her to wake up and burst out in laughter. Up and down, up and down, she kept tickling. Then, she moved to Prim's sides. She grabbed them and squeezed them gently. Since Katniss' own belly was hyper-ticklish, she knew how to work Prim's sides to get the most laughter out of her. Prim jumped from side to side, but a grinning but focused Katniss squeezed her sides just right. Then she moved to her belly, lightly fluttering her fingernails over her belly, but occasionally going in for another poke in the side, just to keep Prim on edge. Katniss knew Prim actually liked being tickled by her big sister. As long as she got revenge, of course. Katniss knew she would have to surrender her feet and belly to be tickled by Prim some other time. She actually liked being tickled, too, so it wasn't even a problem. Both of them were ticklish, loved being tickled, and were expert ticklers. Katniss returned to Prim's ribs, running her nails over them and poking them in just the right places. Katniss smiled at the thought of Prim fluttering her nails on Katniss' feet, expertly tickling them. Then, Katniss decided Prim needed to be tickled on a new spot. But where?
1212.title: Prim's Belly

12121.content:
Katniss decided if she wanted Prim to tickle her feet later on, she would have to get Prim's right now. She slowly stopped tickling Prim's stomach, slowly making her way down to the feet, teasing Prim. Prim knew full well what to expect from one of Katniss's foot tickles. She braced herself while Katniss went in for the kill. She started right in the middle of the feet, using all ten fingers. Prim burst out in ticklish laughter, but this did not even bother Katniss who knew Prim would calm down. Prim knew she had better calm down, and save all her ticklish laughter for what was to happen in about five minutes. After five minutes of feet tickling, Katniss picked up the electric toothbrush, glancing evilly at Prim's toes. Prim swallowed. This was her most ticklish spot, directly on the bottom of her bare toes. Katniss was wondering whether to do it or not, and decided that if she was going to get a good foot tickle from Prim, she had to do it. She applied some soft oil turned on the toothbrush. Prim looked down helplessly at her bare, vulnerable toes. She knew how much it would tickle. Before she even had time to finish her thought, it happened. The toothbrush touched her toes.
If anyone was in the house, they would have called the Peacekeepers, because the explosive, screaming, ticklish laugher that came out of Prim's mouth could probably have been heard at the next house. Prim's toes were TICKLISH! As much as Prim loved it, she couldn't control herself. Her laughter could have been heard everywhere. Katniss knew Prim actually liked it, so tickle, tickle, tickle, went Prim's toes.
12121.title: Feet

choices: Get the rope and tie Prim's arms up to the top of the bed
1213.content: Katniss carefully crawled onto Prim's bed and lower her blanket slightly to reveal her arms. She slowly lifted her arms up to her head and immediately thought to herself, If I tickle Prim, she'll soon wake up and immediately pull her arms down, and I can't let that happen. There's some rope I kept somewhere in the living room, and I'm also pretty strong on my own. What should Katniss do?
1213.title: Prim's Underarms

choices: Katniss can do better than that
12131.content:
Katniss went into the living room and got some rope that she hid behind the couch. She walked back to Prim's room and proceeded to tie up Prims arms to the top of the bed. When she was done, she looked at her work of art. Little, tired, and helpless Prim being tied up and ready for a ticklish armpit session.
Katniss brought her finger up to the sensitive skin and gently stoked the ticklish flesh of Prim. After about 3 seconds of gentle tickling, Prim's arms were slightly tugging on the rope and her face had a big giggly smile. So she went a little bit faster, causing prim to slightly jerk her body from left to right and let out little cute giggles.
Okay, enough of that. Let's get a little more intense., She thought to herself.

Katniss scraped her fingernails all over both armpits, and Prim immediately woke up and turned into a giggly mess.

"K-katnisshshssss, w-whahahat arhere youhoho dohohoing?" Prim giggled.

"Oh, you were so helpless and vulderable, and I couldn't resist not hearing you giggle on a day like this!" Katniss cheerfully explained

"Kahahatniss Ihaha'mhm rehehahally tireherd pleaheheessstohahop!" Prim laughed

"Ohh but we're just getting started" Katniss said, as she started to tickle extremely fast and vigerously on Prim's sensitive armpits.

"NONONOOHOHOHO KAAAHAHHTNISISISISSHEAOAOHAHAAHEHEHEEH STAHHAHAHAAHHP TIHICKLHIHIHNG MEHEHEHE!!!!"

"Hmmm, maybe..."

info.brief_description: The Characters from The Hunger Games are tickled
info.description:
This is a story where the characters from The Hunger Games get tickled
You can choose to be any of these characters: Katniss, Prim, Peeta, or Gale


Rules:

1. Full Nudity is Allowed
2. No killing
3. Try not to swear to much
4. No gay/lesbian

Have fun!
